item.title: Choose the Church
item.description:
Choose the Church by Elder Albert Choules, Jr., Of the First Quorum of the Seventy given in Saturday Evening of 158th Semiannual General Conference on Fri Sep 30 1988
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.

item.title: A Child’s Love Matured
item.description:
A Child’s Love Matured by Elder Albert Choules, Jr., Of the Seventy given in Saturday Morning of 164th Annual General Conference on Thu Mar 31 1994
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
